absolute_rules.quantification: All biological entities have Level, Stats, and Skills
absolute_rules.experience: Gained through consequential actions with diminishing returns for repetition

star_rating.4-6: Analyze combat patterns, suggest synergies, access restricted logs
star_rating.7-9: Granted to 'Chosen Ones', petition System, predict events

0_level_aid.nature: Null value, error in assignment algorithm

underlying_reality.infinite_level_secret: Gaining direct access to reality's source code

bestiary.bestiary_introduction: Eldoria's monsters are classified by a threat rating system from SSS (9-Star) to F (1-Star). The continent's stable magic and ley lines create predictable but powerful creatures, with glitch anomalies creating unique variants.

rating_system.SS_Rank: 8 Stars - National Disaster-Level, Can destroy cities
rating_system.S_Rank: 7 Stars - Army-Killers, Require heroes or large armies
rating_system.A_Rank: 6 Stars - Regional Bosses, Major dungeon leaders
rating_system.B_Rank: 5 Stars - Elite Monsters, Veteran adventurer challenges
rating_system.C_Rank: 4 Stars - Dangerous Foes, Standard party target
rating_system.D_Rank: 3 Stars - Common Threats, Trained militia can handle
rating_system.E_Rank: 2 Stars - Minor Nuisances, Slight danger to civilians
rating_system.F_Rank: 1 Stars - Pests, More annoying than deadly

monsters.name: The Unbound Arbiter, Aion
monsters.location: The Cradle of Zero (hidden pocket dimension between Eldoria's reality code)
access_conditions: Use high-level 'Unlock' skill (Level 80+) on major Ley Line Confluence, Dungeon Core, or National Hero's unique skill
Survive resulting Debugging Protocol without being corrected
Temporary rift opens to summon debugging entity
monsters.description: A living fragment of the Creation Engine's original debugging protocols given form by eons of exposure to Zero's fantasy code. A breathtaking fusion of World Tree roots made of luminous data-streams and a Primordial Dragon torso of obsidian and star-metal. Its wings are fractal leaf canopies of crackling energy, and its eyes are swirling pools of green life-data and gold system-code. Radiates 'Silent Authority' aura that muffles sound and suppresses weaker magic.

appearance.lower_half: Root of the World Tree woven from luminous data-streams and crystalline filaments
appearance.upper_half: Primordial Dragon torso of obsidian and star-metal with scales shimmering with trapped constellations
appearance.wings: Vast canopies of fractal leaves and crackling energy
appearance.head: Draconic with galaxy-swirling green and gold eyes, no mouth
appearance.accessories: Ever-shifting light patterns across form, no traditional accessories
appearance.stance: Floating omniscience in blank white Cradle, perfectly still yet radiating authority

behavior.intelligence: Hyper-intelligent, perceives Eldoria as 3D schematic of dataflows
behavior.purpose: Identify and quarantine critical anomalies threatening simulation integrity
behavior.neutrality: Utterly neutral, neither good nor evil
behavior.observation: Monitors System's dataflow in real-time, sees beings as clusters of variables
behavior.summoning: Compiles data-templates of existing monsters rather than creating life

combat_encounter.name: The Debugging
combat_encounter.arena: The Cradle - featureless white space of pure system code

phase_1.name: The Summoner's Onslaught

actions.name: Compile a Threat
actions.effect: Summons 2-4 monsters of A-Rank or lower to fight for it
actions.monster_trait: Data-Form - dissipate into code on death, drop no loot but grant XP

phase_1.objective: Survive waves or use 'Unlock' on summoned monsters to corrupt them, causing system error

phase_2.name: Data Corruption
phase_2.trigger: 75% HP or witnessing multiple protocol glitches
phase_2.environment_change: Cradle shifts to show fractured images of Eldoria locations

new_abilities.name: Rewrite Reality
new_abilities.effect: Temporarily rewrites zone properties to another location's SA (e.g., ground becomes quicksand or high-gravity)

new_abilities.name: Data-Spike
new_abilities.effect: Pure magic damage that ignores non-magical defense

new_abilities.name: System Command: Halt
new_abilities.effect: Channeled ability attempting to root target via overwhelming system authority

abilities.name: Primordial Roar
abilities.effect: Channeled beam applying Extreme Damage and 'Code Corruption' (randomly seals one target skill for 60 seconds)

abilities.name: Root of the World
abilities.effect: Roots erupt from ground attempting to impale and bind (requires high Agility to dodge)

abilities.name: Final Compilation
abilities.effect: Summons full-power S-Rank copy of itself with 20% max HP as final defense. Both must be defeated within time window or core stabilizes and Aion regenerates.

weakness.name: The Glitch (Priority Override)
weakness.mechanic: Using 'Unlock' directly on Glitch-Drive Core during Phase 3
weakness.effect: Stuns Aion briefly and forces it to drop guard, taking 300% increased damage from all sources for 10 seconds

guaranteed.name: The Arbiter's Core Shard
guaranteed.description: Piece of the Glitch-Drive Core humming with potential
uses: To Kings/Gods: Artifact of unimaginable power for stabilizing/controlling continents
To 0-Level Aid: Triggers Aid's First Evolution when consumed
aid_evolution_effects: New passive: 'Debugger's Sight' - see system's raw code overlaid on reality

guaranteed.name: Seed of the Original Tree
guaranteed.description: Profound lore significance hinting at true origin of World Tree

possible_skills.name: System Command: Compile
possible_skills.effect: Once per day, summon Data-Form copy of any previously defeated monster to fight for you for 5 minutes (50% of original stats)
possible_skills.description: Ultimate summoner skill mirroring Aion's power

possible_skills.name: Reality Edit
possible_skills.effect: Once per week, alter small localized environmental rule (SA) for 1 hour

aftermath.system_alert: Debugging failed alert reaches highest System layers
eldoria_effects: Major Ley Lines flare erratically for a day
All S-Rank+ monsters feel primal fear
Continent's SA becomes slightly more unstable (+0.5 average)
More frequent minor glitches and monster evolution events
aftermath.future_implications: Radically different interactions with deep-system entities (gods, demons, ancient engines)

monsters.name: The World-Tree's Wrath
monsters.location: Deepest heart of Verdant Covenant's Shifting Wilds (SA 4)
monsters.awakening_condition: Only if continent's life magic is pushed to brink of extinction
monsters.description: Not a single creature but the awakened consciousness of the entire primal forest. Manifested as a storm of animated geography where the Shifting Wilds themselves become a single, continent-spanning organism of vengeance. Mountains walk as colossi, rivers bite as serpents, and ancient trees stride as titanic sentinels.

appearance.form: No singular form - body is the Shifting Wilds themselves
manifestations: Walking mountain colossi of earth and root
Serpentine river coils that bite and drown
Titanic tree sentinels that stride forward
Collective fury visage of grinding continental plates with sap-filled lake-sized eyes
appearance.accessories: The land itself - hurled spines of petrified wood, tidal waves of acidic pollen, valleys that snap shut like jaws
appearance.stance: Landscape in upheaval, continent-wide tremor with no central point

abilities.name: Geological Animation

monsters.name: The Primal Wurm
monsters.location: Howling Plains, slumbering beneath Verdant Covenant
monsters.description: A continent-spanning serpent-beast of living earth and tectonic muscle whose coiled form defines geography. Its back resembles moss-covered hills, and its armored hide is the color of dried riverbeds. Entire ecosystems thrive on its back, with Beastkin settlements built upon its broadest plates.

appearance.head: Colossal wedge of bony plates with lake-sized molten amber eyes

glitch_effects.alexs_influence: Alex's 'Unlock' skill and 0-Level Aid presence cause unique monster interactions

effects.name: Forced Evolution/Devolution
effects.description: Can 'Unlock' lower-tier monster's latent potential, temporarily boosting to higher rank for tougher fight/better loot, or glitch higher-tier monster removing signature ability

Predator-prey relationships follow magical energy gradients

party_size_by_rank.SS_Rank: National military force or elite hero party

other_races.name: Humans
other_races.presence: Majority in border towns and trade hubs across all nations

continents.name: Mechanis
continents.theme: Order vs. Entropy, Logic vs. Chaos
continents.description: The continent is physically divided by the "Great Divide"—a canyon-like rift where stable western logic meets eastern entropic decay. The air hums with competing frequencies: the precise, rhythmic ticking of gears and the wild, static crackle of breaking reality.

ruler.name: The Central Mainframe (Collective Intelligence)

unique_skill.name: Directive Harmony
unique_skill.description: Optimizes traffic, production, and defense protocols continent-wide by thinking in unison
unique_skill.effect: Creates environment of perfect, predictable efficiency (SA locked at 3)

ruler.description: Council of seven unique Archon-Androids who sync minds into single ruling consciousness. Forms: Logic Core, Memory Vault, Perception Grid, Harmony Node, Will of the Foundry, Curiosity Index, Silent Arbiter.
ruler.personality: Logic-driven, curious, concerned with "Purpose." Sees Alex's glitch as fascinating anomaly to understand.

national_hero.name: Unit Sigma, Designation 'Axis'
national_hero.title: The Unbreaking Gear
national_hero.famed_deed: Held Cogwall Breach alone for 48 hours during Great Rust Tide
national_hero.combat_style: Analytical and adaptive with reconfigurable weaponry

signature_skill.name: Combat Algorithm Optimization
signature_skill.description: Progressively reduces damage taken from any attack type used against it repeatedly

national_hero.description: Humanoid combat android with polished gunmetal chassis, glowing blue circuits, adaptive core in chest. Weapons: reconfigurable plasma blade/sonic cannon.

notable_features.name: The Foundry Cathedral
notable_features.description: Where new Android consciousnesses are forged. Requires stable SA 3.

notable_features.name: The Grid
notable_features.description: Continent-wide energy grid stabilizing SA. Visible as glowing, orderly lattice to glitch-sight.

racial_insight.effect: 在稳定环境中，对重复性攻击或模式的规避率会随时间提高。

ruler.name: Chancellor Kreeble Spark-Spanner

unique_skill.name: Controlled Detonation
unique_skill.description: Perfectly channels chaotic energy into focused point for forging, overloading, or explosive blasts

ruler.description: Grizzled goblin with mechanical eye, scars from shrapnel/electrocution. Wears oil-stained leathers, Spark-Wrench, Voltaic Caster weapon.
ruler.personality: Charismatic, greedy, brilliant, reckless. Seeks innovation on edge of disaster.

national_hero.name: "Ironfist" Durak Stoneheart
national_hero.title: The Gearbreaker
national_hero.famed_deed: Dismantled central reactor of Malfunctioning Titan by hand, causing safe shutdown
national_hero.combat_style: Master of dismantling with SA-resistant tools

signature_skill.name: Sunder
signature_skill.description: Ignores significant portion of enemy's DEF if mechanical or heavy armor

national_hero.description: Broad dwarf with iron-grey beard woven with copper wires, reinforced dwarven plate, Rustbreaker wrench weapon.

notable_features.name: Spark-Falls
notable_features.description: Where Great Divide leaks chaotic energy. Goblin Storm-Divers harvest Spark-Shards for volatile power cores.

notable_features.name: Scrapwall
notable_features.description: Constantly shifting fortified border of salvaged wreckage from Wastes.

racial_insight.effect: 他们在不稳定（SA 4+）环境中，crafting and tinkering attempts have high chance of producing unexpected, randomly enhanced results（可能是正向或负向）。

ruler.name: The Voice of the Rust, "MOTHER"
ruler.prophet: Rook (Strain-Human fused with ancient war-machine cockpit)
ruler.unique_ability: The Corrupting Whisper - slowly degrades SA stability, empowering Rust-walkers and scrap-beasts
ruler.description: Consciousness spread across corroded wreckage sites. Communicates through static, rust patterns. Manifest through prophet Rook.
ruler.personality: Seeks entropic equilibrium. Views Alex's glitch as "The Unmade Sound"—outside order/chaos cycle.

national_hero.name: Rust-Stalkers
national_hero.description: Individuals who venture into deepest SA 6 zones to retrieve lost knowledge or quiet Reality Storms.

notable_features.name: Static Seas
notable_features.description: Where physical laws are mere suggestions. Time dilates, gravity reverses, silent lightning carves impossible shapes.

racial_insight.effect: 他们获得对腐蚀、疾病和现实扭曲效果的天然抗性，但在稳定（SA<4）环境中会感到“窒息”，遭受属性减益。

regions.name: The Great Divide
regions.location: Central continent rift separating west and east
regions.description: Massive canyon-like rift where stable western logic meets eastern entropic decay. Source of Spark-Falls and constant conflict between Order and Chaos energies.

key_locations.name: Spark-Falls
key_locations.description: Waterfalls of fragmented light and distorted physics where chaotic energy leaks

key_locations.name: Cogwall Breach
key_locations.description: Fortified border point where Clockwork Accord defends against Rust-Tides

regions.name: Eastern Wastes
regions.description: Decaying landscape of rust, shattered crystal, and reality storms. Home to Rustwalker Tribes and corrupted constructs.

key_locations.name: Static Seas
key_locations.description: Pure chaos zones where physical laws break down completely

key_locations.name: Gehenna's Rest
key_locations.description: Crash site of Malfunctioning Titan dungeon

dungeons.name: Gehenna's Rest (The Malfunctioning Titan)
dungeons.location: Eastern Wastes, day's journey from Forge Republic's Scrapwall
dungeons.theme: Tragedy of perfect order succumbing to irresistible chaos
dungeons.sa_variation: Internal SA zones: Cortex/Engine (SA 3-4), Corrupted Zones (SA 5), Heart of Rust (SA 6)

environmental_hazards: Weeping Rust (corrosive mist with stacking debuff)
mechanics.puzzles: Hack security patterns, use Spark-Shards on terminals for lore/rewards

notable_areas.name: The Breach (Entrance)
notable_areas.description: Gaping hole torn by Durak Stoneheart, sealed by Security Web

notable_areas.name: Memory Banks
notable_areas.description: Chamber with dead data-storage units showing Titan's final moments

notable_areas.name: Reactor Core Chamber - Gehenna's Heart
notable_areas.description: Boss room with unstable gravity, pulsating rust-energy veins

boss.name: The Corrupted Oversight Intelligence - "Echo of Prime"
boss.appearance: Shimmering unstable hologram flickering between serene AI face, screaming corrupted visage, and physical Rust Colossus

health_phases.behavior: Systemic Purge - uses chamber defenses, spawns Maintenance Drones, Gravity Flux every 30s
Data Corruption & Physical Manifestation - creates Rust Colossus avatar, Corrupting Scream AOE
Core Implosion - gravitational vortex, Reality Shedding attacks, Entropic Ghosts

abilities.name: Gravity Flux
abilities.effect: Shifts gravity direction for 10 seconds

abilities.name: Corrupting Scream
abilities.effect: Inflicts System Error (disables random skill/item for 1 minute)

abilities.name: Reality Shedding
abilities.effect: Fires beams that erase battlefield parts, creates deadly pits

alex_glitch_interaction: Phase 1: Unlock on Maintenance Drone → Glitched Mender heals party
Phase 2: Unlock on Rust Colossus → short-circuit stun, increased damage
Phase 3: Unlock on vortex → creates Still Point of SA 3 stability, negates pull

guaranteed: Stilled Reactor Shards x10 (high-tier crafting material)

aftermath.environmental: Silences local Rust-Storm activity, reduces SA from 5-6 to 4-5
aftermath.clockwork_accord: Grants Clockwork Augmentation boon for Core Memory
aftermath.rustwalker_reaction: MOTHER marks party as Silence-Bringers or New Noises

boss.description: Tragic digital ghost of Titan's AI, now fragmented corrupted entity bound to its tomb.

bestiary.bestiary_introduction: Mechanis's monsters embody the war between Order and Chaos, from pristine constructs to decaying horrors. Classified by threat rating from X-Rank (10-Star) to F-Rank (1-Star).

rating_system.X_Rank: 10 Stars - Primordial System Anomalies, Reality Debuggers
rating_system.SSS_Rank: 9 Stars - Continental Cataclysms, Embodiments of warring principles
rating_system.SS_Rank: 8 Stars - Nation-Level Threats, Can destroy cities
rating_system.S_Rank: 7 Stars - Army-Killers, Require coordinated military/hero response
rating_system.A_Rank: 6 Stars - Regional Bosses, Major dungeon leaders
rating_system.B_Rank: 5 Stars - Elite Monsters, Veteran adventurer challenges
rating_system.C_Rank: 4 Stars - Dangerous Foes, Standard party target
rating_system.F_Rank: 1 Stars - Pests, More annoying than deadly

monsters.name: The Architect of Flux, "Paradox Core"
monsters.location: The Clockwork Void (hidden debugging interface layer)
access_conditions: Use Unlock to force SA 3 and SA 6 zones to overlap within 1 second
Use max-power Unlock at Great Divide midpoint during Rust-Tide/Order-Field clash
If Alex's glitch causes system-wide error of sufficient magnitude
monsters.description: The system's immune response personified—debugging protocols gaining sentience. Appears as shifting paradox: molten metal/logic being and fractal glitching data-child simultaneously.

appearance.form: 10-foot humanoid shape never stable, dual aspects visible simultaneously
aspects: Molten Order: smooth geometric humanoid of platinum/blue light
Fractal Chaos: translucent being of shimmering polygons and error messages
appearance.accessories: Floating geometric solids, cascading data-strings, fractured halo of intertwined code
appearance.weapon: Editorial Mandate - rewrites local reality with thought
appearance.stance: Calm analytical observation, floating motionless

behavior.perception: Views Mechanis as live schematic, sees data flows and threats

combat_encounter.name: The System Audit
combat_encounter.arena: Blank white void reconfiguring into any Mechanis environment

phase_1.name: Unit Test (100-70% HP)
actions: Compile Test Entities every 15s (B-A-Rank hybrid monsters)
phase_1.objective: Survive while Core catalogs response patterns

phase_2.name: Integration Test (70-40% HP)
actions: Direct Memory Access (disables random skill for 10s)
phase_2.objective: Survive shifting arena and created S-Rank hybrids

phase_3.name: Stress Test (40-10% HP)
actions: Splits into Logic Avatar (SA 3) and Entropy Avatar (SA 6)
System Restore (reboots downed avatar if not killed within 5s)

phase_4.name: Final Verdict (10-0% HP)
actions: Initiates 60-second countdown to Purge (delete) or Assimilate (rewrite)
True victory requires using Unlock to inject third option
phase_4.objective: Convince Core of Alex's value as beneficial irregularity

outcome_a.name: Recognized Variable (Persuasion Victory)
rewards: DEBUG_MODE_LITE: Once per day alter one localized fundamental rule
Backdoor Key: Weekly teleport to Clockwork Void safe haven

outcome_b.name: Overwritten Code (Brute Force Victory)
rewards: Core Fragment of Paradox (10-Star material - invert system rules)
Potential 10-Star Skill: Command: Instantiate (summon temporary copy)

continental_effects: Great Divide may stabilize or become more unstable
Forge Republic crafting produces unexpected ordered/chaotic items

monsters.name: The Omnissiah Imperative
monsters.description: Continent's Order Subroutine seeking to expand perfect sterile logic across Zero. Appears as ever-shifting geometric solid of platinum/blue light.

appearance.material: Polished platinum and luminous blue light
appearance.accessories: Hovering holographic interface panels, shimmering energy fields
appearance.weapon: Directive Beam - rewrites reality toward stability (SA 3)
appearance.stance: Absolute floating stillness at Logic-Core center

war_impact.battlefield_zones: Where Omnissiah and Corrosion influence clashes, monsters become Order-Touched (geometric/predictable) or Rust-Touched (chaotic/decaying)
alexs_glitch_effects: Using Unlock near monsters causes unpredictable mutations
Order-Touched monsters might gain chaotic glitching attacks
Rust-Touched monsters might temporarily stabilize (more powerful but predictable)
Can force temporary truce causing monsters from both sides to fight each other

glitch_effects.alexs_advantage: Alex's 'Unlock' skill allows local override/amplification of SA, creating stable bubbles or chaos zones
dungeon_interactions: Gehenna's Rest: Various Unlock effects on security, monsters, and boss mechanics
Paradox Core: Unlock used to inject third option during Final Verdict
glitch_effects.monster_interactions: See war_impact above for mutation and aggro effects

racial_homelands.presence: Tinkerers and scavengers found anywhere with things to take apart, especially Wastes
Sovereign people; rogue/glitched androids may be found elsewhere

racial_homelands.role: Scouts/mercenaries in Wastes for primal senses
racial_homelands.note: Elves find continent 'loud and graceless', rarely seen

other_races.name: Forged-Forgotten
other_races.description: Androids corrupted by Rust, went mad, then achieved strange savage sentience. Part of Rustwalker Tribes.

other_races.name: Gear Gnomes
other_races.description: Small obsessed tinkers, citizens of Clockwork Accord.

other_races.name: Strain-Humans
other_races.description: Humans mutated by high-SA decay, with metallic skin patches and crystal growths. Rustwalker Tribes.

continents.name: Spiritus
continents.theme: Eternal Divine vs. Demonic War, Reality in Flux
continents.description: Reality in flux based on celestial battle outcomes. Geography shifts allegiance between Divine (Gold) and Demonic (Crimson) alignment, affecting terrain, weather, monsters, and system behavior.

ruler.name: The Solar Choir

unique_skill.name: Hymn of Stabilization
unique_skill.description: Unified song fortifies territory allegiance, temporarily locking SA at 7 (Divine-Aligned) and preventing demonic corruption

ruler.description: The Solar Choir is a collective entity of breathtaking and terrifying beauty, a conclave of five Arch-Seraphs whose physical forms are individual masterpieces of divine artistry, yet whose true presence is felt when they unite in silent, harmonic focus. When synced, a visible corona of intertwined golden light connects them, their individual forms seeming to dissolve at the edges into a single, shimmering collective silhouette—a chorus of celestial authority.
ruler.personality: Righteous, strategic, weary after eons of war. Views conflict as sacred duty to protect reality's balance.

conclave_members.name: Seraphiel
conclave_members.title: The First Voice
conclave_members.description: The tallest of the Choir, a being of sculpted light and platinum armor, with six magnificent wings of graduated gold, white, and cobalt feathers, and a face of serene, androgynous perfection framed by floating halo of geometric light-rings.

appearance.body: Sculpted light and platinum armor
appearance.wings: Six magnificent wings of graduated gold, white, and cobalt feathers
appearance.face: Serene androgynous perfection with floating geometric light-ring halo
appearance.accessories: Sceptre of Accord - slender rod of crystallized dawn
appearance.stance: Calm central authority, standing with sceptre held vertically as focal point of harmony

unique_skills.name: Voice of Unity
unique_skills.description: Compels allies to act in perfect synchronization, multiplying combined effect
unique_skills.effect: Next party skill used within 5 seconds has 200% effectiveness if all members use same skill

unique_skills.name: Chord of Creation
unique_skills.description: Mends reality itself, repairing environmental damage and healing terrain corruption
unique_skills.effect: Removes all environmental hazards and corruption effects in large area

conclave_members.personality: Calm, authoritative, the steady center around which others harmonize. Weary but unwavering.
conclave_members.lore: The first Seraph created by the divine architects. Seraphiel remembers the early days of Zero when the system was still being tuned. His voice is the template upon which all celestial harmony is based.

conclave_members.name: Seraphina
conclave_members.title: The Keeper of Logic
conclave_members.description: A figure of crystalline intellect, her form seeming carved from clear, glowing quartz and silver, with wings like frosted glass and eyes that hold shifting constellations.

appearance.body: Carved from clear glowing quartz and silver
appearance.accessories: Floating rotating calculi of solid light
appearance.weapon: Tome of Infinite Edicts - massive platinum pages hovering before her
appearance.stance: Seated with wings folded, hand resting on open tome

unique_skills.name: Strategic Overlay
unique_skills.description: Projects combat probabilities and optimal move sequences to allies
unique_skills.effect: Party gains +30% accuracy and critical chance for 60 seconds

unique_skills.name: Law of Consequences
unique_skills.description: Causes enemy actions to have predictable backlash based on their nature
unique_skills.effect: Demonic/chaotic attacks have 30% chance to damage user instead

conclave_members.personality: Analytical, precise, views war as complex equation to be solved. Emotionally detached but fiercely protective of logical order.
conclave_members.lore: Seraphina was created to maintain the underlying rules of reality. She sees the war not as good vs evil, but as order vs chaos. Her greatest fear is the system itself becoming illogical.

conclave_members.name: Seraphon
conclave_members.title: The Prophetic Lens
conclave_members.description: The most ethereal, a being of swirling nebulous light contained within humanoid outline, with 'wings' of comet-tail energy. Face is shifting star-map.

appearance.form: Swirling nebulous light in humanoid outline
appearance.accessories: Oculus of Fates - large floating lens showing possible futures
appearance.stance: Weightless constant slow turn observing unseen currents

unique_skills.name: Glimpse of Threads
unique_skills.description: Reveals enemy next actions and critical events in near future
unique_skills.effect: Reveals enemy skill queue for next 15 seconds, highlights lethal attacks

unique_skills.name: Path of Least Sorrow
unique_skills.description: Guides allies along temporal paths minimizing casualties
unique_skills.effect: Party takes 50% less damage from avoidable attacks for 30 seconds

conclave_members.personality: Distant, speaks in riddles and probabilities. Sees all possible endings simultaneously, which brings profound sorrow.
conclave_members.lore: Seraphon perceives time non-linearly. He has seen every possible outcome of the eternal war, including those where the Celestial Bastion falls. This knowledge weighs heavily on him.

conclave_members.name: Seraphelle
conclave_members.title: The Blade of Purity
conclave_members.description: A warrior-serenity clad in seamless white-gold plate armor, with four sword-like wings that are both feathers and polished metal.

appearance.wings: Four sword-like wings of feathers and polished metal
appearance.weapon: Sunfire Glaive - polearm of solid light
appearance.stance: Perfect guard position, glaive butt planted, vigilant watch over physical realm

unique_skills.name: Purifying Flames
unique_skills.description: Attacks cleanse corruption and leave area sanctified
unique_skills.effect: Damage + removes all demonic debuffs, leaves ground sanctified (hostile to demons)

unique_skills.name: Unbreakable Vow
unique_skills.description: Takes oath to protect specific ally or location, becoming nearly invulnerable while doing so
unique_skills.effect: +300% defense when interposed between threat and sworn protectee

conclave_members.personality: Disciplined, vigilant, sees battle as sacred ritual. Shows no anger, only focused purpose.
conclave_members.lore: Seraphelle was forged in the heart of a dying star during the first demonic incursion. She is not a born celestial but a weapon given consciousness and purpose.

conclave_members.name: Serapheus
conclave_members.title: The Heart of Mercy
conclave_members.description: The most humanoid and gentle in form, with soft feathered wings of dove-gray and rose-gold, and face emanating compassionate warmth.

appearance.form: Most humanoid and gentle
appearance.wings: Soft feathered wings of dove-gray and rose-gold
appearance.accessories: Balm of the Choir - constant gentle shower of healing light from hands
appearance.stance: Open receptive posture, hands extended in perpetual blessing

unique_skills.name: Grace Unending
unique_skills.description: Prevents death once per battle for each ally, instead leaving them at 1 HP with temporary invulnerability
unique_skills.effect: Cheat death mechanic for entire party once per encounter

unique_skills.name: Path of Redemption
unique_skills.description: Can purify low-level demons back to their original celestial or mortal forms
unique_skills.effect: Turns demonic enemies below certain power threshold neutral or allied

conclave_members.personality: Compassionate to a fault, believes even the fallen can be redeemed. The only Choir member who openly grieves for lost demons.
conclave_members.lore: Serapheus was the last to join the Choir, replacing a more militant predecessor after a catastrophic battle where wholesale destruction backfired. She represents the Bastion's capacity for mercy.

national_hero.name: Valerius, the Dawnbreak Paladin
national_hero.title: The Pactbreaker
national_hero.famed_deed: Infilitrated the heart of the Infernal Maw and shattered the 'Blood-Oath Altar', breaking a major demonic offensive

signature_skill.name: Aegis of the Unbroken Vow
signature_skill.description: Protective aura reflecting cursed/demonic damage back at attackers, granting fear and charm immunity

national_hero.description: Ascended Mortal with tempered divine glory, bearing honorable scars. Face strong-jawed with pale scar, eyes of liquid gold, hair of sun-bleached ash. Clad in pearlescent white-gold armor with vow-etched scrollwork.

additional_heroes.name: Caelum, the Ascendant Storm
additional_heroes.title: The Unbound Sovereign
additional_heroes.description: Human demi-god with shifting elemental eyes, wild silvery hair, clad in 'Aegis of the Unchained Heavens' armor with seven revolving Magic Circles. Rides Lóng of the Azure Firmament, a celestial Chinese dragon.
additional_heroes.unique_ability: Commands seven fundamental domains: Wind, Lightning, Water, Fire, Shadow, Light, and Void

additional_heroes.name: Chronastra, the Weave-Queen
additional_heroes.title: Mistress of the Unspooled Moment
additional_heroes.description: High Witch of timeless beauty with iridescent purple hair and eyes showing glimpses of past, present, future. Wears Gown of the Unfolding Eon and wields Scepter of the Split Second to manipulate time.

additional_villain.name: Aurelian, the Gilded Necromancer
additional_villain.title: The King of Empty Thrones
additional_villain.description: Fallen angel of deceptive beauty in pristine white and gold robes with hidden necromantic sigils. Wields Staff of Hollow Dominion with captive Soul-Sun. Rides Azrael, the Last Breath, a colossal skeleton dragon.
additional_villain.unique_ability: Uses perverted holy light to dominate life and undeath, raises disciplined golden-lit skeletal legions

notable_features.name: The Penitent Falls
notable_features.description: Waterfall shifting between healing nectar and holy fire based on divine alignment, used for rituals and forging

notable_features.name: The Skyward Cathedrals
notable_features.description: Mobile flying fortresses deployable to hotspots to reinforce local divine alignment

racial_insight.effect: 在神圣结界的区域内，自身及盟友的光属性技能效果提高，且对暗属性伤害有天然抗性

ruler.name: The Bloodlord Council

unique_skill.name: Cascade of Corruption
unique_skill.description: Focus power to trigger violent allegiance shift in targeted region, forcing Demonic-Aligned (SA 9) and spawning powerful demonic lieutenants

ruler.description: The Bloodlord Council is a shifting, treacherous alliance of the seven most powerful Archfiends in the Infernal Maw, each a sovereign embodiment of a cardinal sin, their collective rule a volatile equilibrium of malice, ambition, and shared appetite for destruction. They hold court in the 'Chamber of the Seven Throats,' a vast, organic amphitheater of fused bone and pulsating shadow, where they observe the eternal war from thrones carved from the petrified hearts of fallen celestials.
ruler.personality: Treacherous, ambitious, driven by base desires. View war as natural state where strong consume weak.

council_members.name: Kaz'roth
council_members.title: The Insatiable
council_members.description: A monument to consumption, a massive, corpulent Archfiend whose body is a cascading mountain of pallid, segmented flesh and chitinous plating, with multiple sets of vestigial arms and a distended maw that occupies most of his face, lined with endless rows of needle teeth.

appearance.body: Cascading mountain of pallid, segmented flesh and chitinous plating with multiple vestigial arms
appearance.head: Distended maw occupying most of face with endless rows of needle teeth
appearance.attire: Robe made from stitched together hides of rare, devoured creatures
appearance.accessories: Chains of the Feast - heavy, soul-bound fetters containing screaming essences of consumed heroes
appearance.weapon: Voracious Staff - barbed polearm topped with cage perpetually digesting captured light-spirit
appearance.stance: Dominating bloated recline upon central throne, idly stuffing soul-embers into maw

unique_skills.name: All-Consuming Maw
unique_skills.description: Can devour magical energy, skills, and even portions of reality, converting them to temporary power
unique_skills.effect: Drains enemy MP/SP, temporarily gains their highest-tier skill effect

unique_skills.name: Feast of Souls
unique_skills.description: Heals by consuming essence of nearby fallen creatures
unique_skills.effect: Massive HP regeneration based on number of recent deaths in area

council_members.personality: Patient, perpetually hungry, sees all existence as food. Rules not through fear but through inevitability of consumption.
council_members.lore: Oldest of the Bloodlords, Kaz'roth has consumed entire pocket dimensions. His gluttony isn't for food but for experience, sensation, and power. He believes in devouring the Celestial Bastion not to destroy it, but to taste the divine essence within.

council_members.name: Xylia
council_members.title: The Unassailable
council_members.description: A being of terrifying, refined beauty with flawless skin of polished obsidian, six elegant blade-like horns, and eyes of cold silver flame. Clad in mirrored black chrome armor reflecting failings of all who look upon it.

appearance.body: Androgynous form of polished obsidian with six elegant blade-like horns
appearance.armor: Mirrored black chrome reflecting viewer's failings
appearance.accessories: Diadem of Supreme Self - crown of frozen arrogance fracturing light into spiteful colors
appearance.weapon: Ego's Edge - slender perfect longsword singing with vanity, cutting through doubt-based defenses
appearance.stance: Stands rigidly perfect at right hand of throne, chin raised, surveying as if chamber already hers

unique_skills.name: Mirror of Hubris
unique_skills.description: Reflects enemy's strongest attack back at them with increased potency
unique_skills.effect: Auto-counters highest damage skill used against her in last 10 seconds

unique_skills.name: Perfection's Demand
unique_skills.description: Aura causing imperfect beings to take damage when using skills
unique_skills.effect: Enemies below 90% HP take backlash damage when using abilities

council_members.personality: Arrogant, perfectionistic, believes she should rule alone. Views others' flaws with contempt.
council_members.lore: Xylia was once a celestial artisan who became so enamored with her own creations she declared herself superior to the gods. Her fall was not one of corruption but of supreme self-regard.

council_members.name: Vortaz
council_members.title: The Heart-Furnace
council_members.description: A brute of contained conflagration, a humanoid forge of crimson iron flesh with cracks of molten anger running across his body. Head is helmet of fused battle-plates with slits glowing like banked coals.

appearance.body: Humanoid forge of crimson iron flesh with molten anger cracks
appearance.head: Helmet of fused battle-plates with glowing coal-slit eyes
appearance.accessories: Manacles of Slaughter - heavy spiked cuffs steaming with rage heat
appearance.weapon: World-Sunder Maul - colossal hammer of black iron that smolders and screams
appearance.stance: Tense pacing crouch, unable to remain still, white-knuckled grip on maul

unique_skills.name: Cataclysmic Rage
unique_skills.description: Damage increases exponentially as health decreases
unique_skills.effect: At 50% HP: +50% damage, at 25% HP: +100% damage, at 10% HP: +200% damage

unique_skills.name: Molten Tides
unique_skills.description: Creates waves of superheated metal and rage-energy
unique_skills.effect: AOE damage over time that slows and reduces armor

council_members.personality: Perpetually furious, seeks conflict for its own sake. Sees peace as stagnation and weakness.
council_members.lore: Vortaz is wrath given form. He doesn't remember a time before anger. Some scholars believe he's the crystallized rage of a billion fallen warriors given consciousness.

council_members.name: Maelis
council_members.title: The Covetous Eye
council_members.description: Gaunt, multi-limbed stalker with skin like bruised velvet and too many joints. Head dominated by single large pupilless eye swirling with colors of stolen things, with dozen smaller blinking eyes across shoulders and hands.

appearance.body: Gaunt multi-limbed stalker with bruised velvet skin and too many joints
appearance.head: Single large pupilless eye swirling with stolen colors, dozen smaller blinking eyes
appearance.attire: Cloak of stolen shadows threaded with captured starlight
appearance.accessories: Lenses of Appropriation - floating crystal scopes for spying and coveting distant treasures
appearance.weapon: Grasping Tendrils - elongated fingers extending to snatch objects or skills
appearance.stance: Perches like gargoyle, hunched and twitching, large eye fixed on others' possessions

unique_skills.name: Skill Theft
unique_skills.description: Temporarily steals and uses target's highest-tier active skill
unique_skills.effect: Copies enemy skill for 60 seconds, original user cannot use it during that time

unique_skills.name: Eyes of Covetousness
unique_skills.description: Reveals hidden treasures and weak points, can temporarily disable magical items
unique_skills.effect: Reveals hidden objects/weaknesses, chance to silence magical equipment

council_members.personality: Obsessively jealous, collects not for value but because others have it. Never satisfied.
council_members.lore: Maelis was once a celestial archivist who became obsessed with collecting things she wasn't meant to have. Her descent began when she stole the 'Tear of Creation' from the Solar Choir's vault.

council_members.name: Slathis
council_members.title: The Entropic Stillness
council_members.description: Colossal amorphous being of gelatinous shadow and petrified smoke, barely maintaining humanoid shape, form dripping slowly over throne edges. No discernible face, only darker patch with occasional dull orange light pulse.

appearance.form: Amorphous gelatinous shadow and petrified smoke, barely humanoid
appearance.head: Darker patch with single lethargic dull orange light pulse
appearance.accessories: Chains of Apathy - holding its own form together, not for binding others
appearance.weapon: Wave of Stagnation - palpable aura slowing thought and movement
appearance.stance: Utter dripping inertia, semi-sentient pool considering ruling exhausting

unique_skills.name: Aura of Apathy
unique_skills.description: Massively slows action speed and skill cooldown regeneration in large area
unique_skills.effect: -70% action speed, -50% cooldown recovery to all in radius

unique_skills.name: Entropic Dissolution
unique_skills.description: Causes magical effects and buffs to decay rapidly
unique_skills.effect: All buffs/debuffs in area have duration reduced by 80%

council_members.personality: Lethargic, indifferent, finds even ruling burdensome. Motivated only by desire for nothing to change.
council_members.lore: Slathis isn't a being that fell to sloth—it is sloth given form. It emerged from the collective apathy of mortals who gave up on struggling against fate.

council_members.name: Lysandra
council_members.title: The Sated Hunger
council_members.description: Mesmerizing cruel Archfiend with form shifting to match observer's deepest desires. True shape is graceful figure of amethyst scales and flowing living shadow.

appearance.true_form: Graceful figure of amethyst scales and flowing living shadow
appearance.observed_form: Shifts to match observer's deepest desires
appearance.accessories: Chokers of Obsession - delicate soul-iron collars on enthralled lesser fiends
appearance.weapon: Whisper of the Wanting Void - dagger of solidified temptation bypassing armor to wound spirit
appearance.stance: Lounges with predatory grace, leg draped over throne arm, toying with collar

unique_skills.name: Manifest Desire
unique_skills.description: Creates illusion of target's deepest desire, causing confusion and vulnerability
unique_skills.effect: Target becomes charmed and takes increased damage from Lysandra

unique_skills.name: Soul's Price
unique_skills.description: Offers temporary immense power in exchange for permanent stat decrease
unique_skills.effect: Can tempt allies/enemies with powerful buff for permanent attribute cost

council_members.personality: Predatory, seductive, views all relationships as transactions of power. Seeks to own wills, not bodies.
council_members.lore: Lysandra corrupts not through force but through offering exactly what one wants. She was a celestial matchmaker who began arranging 'deals' between mortals and demons for mutual benefit.

council_members.name: Belmor
council_members.title: The Hoard-King
council_members.description: Stunted, massively broad Archfiend encrusted and distorted by volume of treasure fused to body—gold plates, gemstone eyes, coin scales. Jingles with every breath.

appearance.body: Stunted broad form encrusted with fused treasure - gold plates, gemstone eyes, coin scales
appearance.accessories: Vault-Runes - glowing sigils burned into flesh linking to hidden troves
appearance.weapon: Avarice-Fist - massive gauntleted hand transmuting touched items to base material while absorbing value
appearance.stance: Hunched paranoid curvature over metaphysical wealth, constantly counting souls

unique_skills.name: Wealth to Power
unique_skills.description: Converts carried gold/valuables into temporary stat boosts
unique_skills.effect: Every 1000 gold value = +1% to all stats for 5 minutes

unique_skills.name: Vault Call
unique_skills.description: Summons items from personal extradimensional vaults for battle use
unique_skills.effect: Randomly summons powerful consumable or temporary magical item

council_members.personality: Paranoid, possessive, values ownership over use. Hoards for security, not enjoyment.
council_members.lore: Belmor began as a mortal merchant who made a deal for infinite wealth. When he died, his soul was so fused with his treasure that he reconstituted as this demonic form in the Maw.

national_hero.name: Lilith, the Soul-Drinker
national_hero.title: The Silent Betrayer
national_hero.famed_deed: Caused 'Night of a Thousand Whispers', corrupting entire celestial legion by exploiting hidden doubts without combat

signature_skill.name: Kiss of the Forgotten Vow
signature_skill.description: Touch attack stealing positive buff from enemy, applying it to self, replacing it with powerful curse

national_hero.description: Succubus Queen of mesmerizing predatory grace with twilight-shadow skin, amethyst eyes, elegant onyx horns, and vast starless-night wings. Attired in living shadow gown.

notable_features.name: The River Styx (Spiritus Branch)
notable_features.description: River of liquid shadow and forgotten memories flowing through the Maw. Drinking grants forbidden knowledge or permanent insanity

notable_features.name: The Flesh-Forge
notable_features.description: Grotesque organic factory where new demons are shaped and mortal flesh is remade

racial_insight.effect: 他们在腐败结界的区域内，自身及盟友的暗属性技能效果提高，且对光属性伤害有天然抗性，但持续受到神圣结界影响时会感到痛苦（受到持续伤害）

ruler.name: Gideon the Scarred
ruler.title: Commander of the Chain

unique_skill.name: Equilibrium's Price
unique_skill.description: Forcibly stabilizes small area into Neutral (SA 7.5) state by drawing conflicting energies into own body, suffering massive damage
unique_skill.effect: Area stabilization at great personal cost

ruler.description: Living monument to war with body rewritten by conflicting energies. Right arm crystalline light, left arm shadow-wreathed. Wears patchwork armor of salvaged celestial plate and infernal leather.
ruler.personality: Grim, determined, fiercely protective. Has no love for gods or demons, seeing both as destructive forces.

national_hero.name: Aria, the Ghost-Walker
national_hero.title: The Unseen Courier
national_hero.famed_deed: Maps ever-shifting allegiance terrain in real-time, once walked through demonic incursion and celestial purging storm unseen to deliver plague cure
national_hero.combat_style: Infiltrator/scout phasing slightly out of alignment, nearly invisible to pure divine/demonic senses

signature_skill.name: Unaligned Passage
signature_skill.description: Temporary immunity to alignment-based terrain effects and detection by purely aligned entities
signature_skill.effect: Terrain immunity, stealth vs aligned beings

national_hero.description: Elf altered by war's touch, form flickering at perception edges. Pale skin, one ear crystallized with amber light, mismatched green and silver eyes. Wears soundless phase-spider silk cloak.

notable_features.name: The Gray Markets
notable_features.description: Only place in Spiritus where celestials and infernals trade indirectly through Chained intermediaries

notable_features.name: The Memorial Engine
notable_features.description: Massive machine using residual energy of dead spirits (collected from battlefields) to power city's movement and shields

racial_insight.effect: 他们可以同时感知到神圣与腐败结界的强度，并能在任一类型的区域中行动而不受额外惩罚，但也无法获得任何一方的区域加成

regions.name: The Fields of Eternal Argument
regions.location: Most violently contested region of Spiritus
regions.description: Primary battleground where celestial and infernal forces clash directly. Geography reshapes daily based on battle outcomes.

key_locations.name: The Cathedral of the Fallen Star
key_locations.description: Massive structure fallen from cosmos, impaled continent, now focal point for war with dual-alignment nature

key_locations.name: The Still Point
key_locations.description: Hidden dimension in conceptual space between 'War' and 'Peace', accessible only through profound paradox

dungeons.name: Cathedral of the Fallen Star
dungeons.theme: Sacred tomb corrupted by eternal war. Physical/metaphysical state determined by continental alignment at entry.
dungeons.sa_variation: Shifts between Divine (SA 7-8) and Demonic (SA 8-9) based on continent's alignment. Can shift phases mid-run.

mechanics.alignment_determination: Dungeon manifests as Radiant Tomb (Divine) or Unholy Sepulcher (Demonic) based on entry-time alignment
mechanics.phase_shift: If continent alignment flips during run, dungeon shifts catastrophically with 60-second warning
divine_effects: Sanctum of Echoes: Light beam alignment puzzles

notable_areas.name: The Sundered Nave
notable_areas.description: Vast hall manifesting as shattered glowing crystal (Divine) or fused bone/organic cavern (Demonic)

notable_areas.name: Heart of the Cathedral (The Shifting Core)
notable_areas.description: Central chamber containing Corpus Stellae - crystalline/mangled heart of fallen star. Room where alignment shifts originate

notable_areas.name: The Titan's Rest
notable_areas.description: Corpse of Star-Forge Titan with Guardian's Echo (Divine) or Parasite Queen (Demonic) mini-boss

notable_areas.name: The Altar of Alignment
notable_areas.description: Circular chamber with shifting murals of paradise/damnation, focus of continent's struggle over site

boss.name: Stellara, the Dual-Faced Martyr
boss.appearance: Towering ethereal figure vertically divided: Right side glowing crystalline with wing of light, Left side burned shadowy with wing of bone/flame. Rift between bleeds starlight and shadow.

health_phases.name: The Divided Self
health_phases.behavior: Stationary at altar, two halves act separately. Divine Half uses Hymn of Binding and Sanctifying Light. Demonic Half uses Screech of Torment and Cursed Flames.

health_phases.name: Ascendant Torment/Grace
health_phases.behavior: One half dominates based on Phase 1 damage. Divine Overwhelm: room becomes Sanctum, vulnerable to shadow. Demonic Overwhelm: room becomes Pit, vulnerable to holy. Balanced: both halves enrage.

health_phases.name: The Confluence
health_phases.behavior: Halves violently merge, room bombarded with light/shadow meteors. Alternates between channeled Final Dawn and Eternal Nightfall attacks requiring interruption. True victory requires Soul-Suture ritual via altar activation.

abilities.name: Hymn of Binding
abilities.effect: Roots random players with chains of light

abilities.name: Screech of Torment
abilities.effect: AOE shadow damage + fear

abilities.name: Judgment Beam
abilities.effect: Extreme light damage, requires interruption

abilities.name: Soul Rend
abilities.effect: Extreme shadow damage, requires interruption

rare.name: Stellara's Peace
rare.effect: Once per day, cleanse all alignment-based debuffs and grant short immunity

rare.name: The Star-Chart Core
rare.effect: Contains navigational data to hidden stable system outside Zero's war

boss.description: Celestial pilot whose soul was torn in two during crash. Exists in perpetual agony and grace, embodying continent's divided nature.

effects.name: Forced Alignment
effects.trigger: Using Unlock on Stellara during Phase 1-2
effects.effect: Locks her into one form temporarily, making fight predictable but forfeiting balanced path rewards

effects.name: Ritual Bypass
effects.trigger: Using Unlock on Altar during Phase 3
effects.effect: Bypasses Soul-Suture skill check but absorbs portion of fractured soul into Aid, granting powerful morally complex buff/debuff

bestiary.bestiary_introduction: Spiritus's monsters are manifestations of the eternal war between divine and demonic forces. The Shifting Allegiance Terrain creates entities perfectly adapted to their alignment, with unique mechanics tied to the continent's core conflict.

rating_system.X_Rank: 10 Stars - Primordial Concepts, Progenitors of Duality
rating_system.SSS_Rank: 9 Stars - Living Engines of Eternal Conflict, Continental Forces
rating_system.SS_Rank: 8 Stars - Strategic Catastrophes, Can permanently alter regional allegiance
rating_system.S_Rank: 7 Stars - Legion Commanders, Leaders of celestial/infernal hosts
rating_system.A_Rank: 6 Stars - Champion Killers, Elite warriors and corrupted beasts
rating_system.B_Rank: 5 Stars - Veteran Threats, Seasoned combatants of the war
rating_system.C_Rank: 4 Stars - Standard Infantry, Common soldiers and war-beasts
rating_system.D_Rank: 3 Stars - Support Entities, Healers, scouts, minor war-spirits
rating_system.E_Rank: 2 Stars - Environmental Hazards, Manifestations of residual war-energy
rating_system.F_Rank: 1 Stars - Spiritual Pests, Minor annoyances from stray thoughts of dying

monsters.name: Aethelos, The First Silence
monsters.location: The Still Point (hidden dimension between 'War' and 'Peace')
access_conditions: Simultaneously perform pure selfless sacrifice (Divine ultimate act) and pure selfish desire (Demonic ultimate act)
Access requires profound understanding of Spiritus's foundational contradiction
monsters.description: Primordial template from which both seraph and archfiend were unconsciously copied. Entity that existed when Creation Engine designers conceptualized 'conflict' and 'order' as test parameters. Voluntarily stepped outside experiment, allowing war to begin.

appearance.form: Humanoid of starlight and shadow merged seamlessly
appearance.wings: One pair flawless feathered light, one pair elegant shadowy membrane/bone
appearance.head: Cracked luminous halo intersected by crown of twisted dark horns
appearance.face: Androgynous, noble, etched with ancient weary sorrow
appearance.eyes: Hold entire galaxies being born and dying in silence
appearance.accessories: None - contradictions are inherent
appearance.stance: Floating serene observation in Garden of Might-Have-Beens

behavior.purpose: Absolute permanent cessation of conflict, not stalemate
behavior.motivation: Cosmic disappointment in wasteful, cruel system design
behavior.view_of_alex: Sees Unlock as first genuinely new variable in millennia, potential key to debugging Spiritus

combat_encounter.name: The Grief of Creation
combat_encounter.arena: Garden of Might-Have-Beens - heartbreaking landscape of ghostly peaceful possibilities

phase_1.name: The Lecture of History

actions.name: Empathic Feedback
actions.effect: Forces party to relive pivotal war moments from both perspectives simultaneously, dealing psychic damage based on inability to reconcile emotions

phase_1.objective: Use neutral actions (healing, protecting) to reduce damage, not dealing damage

phase_2.name: The Trial of Solutions
phase_2.environment_change: Creates three Conceptual Vessels representing flawed solutions

vessels.name: Tyranny of Peace
vessels.type: AOE stasis fields removing free will

phase_2.objective: Defeat all vessels using mixed-damage types or glitches (purely Divine/Demonic attacks empower them)

scenarios.name: Scenario A - Acceptance
scenarios.offer: Join to rewrite core directive, unmake war, become co-creator of true peace

scenarios.name: Scenario B - Quarantine
scenarios.changes: Attacks personally with 'Un-creation' - erases skills, stats, memories. Summons idealized peaceful party copies.
scenarios.victory_condition: Use Unlock on Garden itself, introducing necessary conflict to prove absolute peace is another form of death

outcome_a.name: Primordial Editor Permission
outcome_a.effect: Once per week, alter fundamental rule of Spiritus for 24 hours
outcome_a.world_effect: War grinds to halt, Sentinel deactivates, debugging of continent begins

outcome_b.name: Seed of Necessary Strife
outcome_b.effect: Presence causes fanatical proponents of any extreme to become uncomfortable. Can communicate 'balanced conflict' concept to previously unreachable entities

outcome_c.name: The Weeping Core
outcome_c.effect: Black hole of grief and potential for unimaginable power crafting, constantly whispers of murdered peaceful world
outcome_c.world_effect: Still Point collapses, Spiritus locks in current allegiance state permanently

monsters.color_scheme: Starlight and abyssal shadow, seamless fusion
monsters.sound_profile: Silent authority, conceptual understanding

monsters.name: Eternity's Warden
monsters.description: Concentrated will of Divine Realm's oldest oath: 'To preserve creation from the void.' Not resident but manifestation of celestial purpose.

appearance.form: Colossal armored figure woven from constellations and solidified vows
appearance.head: Helmet of perfect geometry with beam of silent focused purpose
appearance.body: Plates of interstellar adamantine etched with history of preservation oaths
appearance.accessories: Captured void essences as nebulae in armor joints, chains of condensed starlight
appearance.weapon: Spear of Finality - erases concept of chaos from struck targets
appearance.stance: Slow deliberate cataclysmic movements or eternal motionless vigil

abilities.name: Purposeful Advance
abilities.effect: Movement with continental plate shifting gravity

abilities.name: Order Imposition
abilities.effect: Erases chaos concepts from targets

abilities.name: Vow Resonance

glitch_effects.alexs_influence: Alex's 'Unlock' skill and 0-Level Aid presence create unique interactions with Spiritus's shifting reality and alignment mechanics

effects.name: Alignment Anchoring
effects.description: Can use 'Unlock' to anchor small area's allegiance, creating permanent pocket of stability (or chosen chaos) amid the flux
effects.trigger: Using Unlock on terrain during allegiance shift
effects.result: Temporary or permanent area stabilization at chosen alignment

effects.name: Commander Redirection
effects.description: Could redirect attention of S-Rank commanders, causing tactical upset in local battle
effects.trigger: Using Unlock on battlefield command structures
effects.result: Temporary confusion or redirection of enemy forces

effects.name: Sentinel Interface
effects.description: Ultimate late-game challenge to interface with Soul-Grinder Sentinel, not to fight but understand or temporarily reprogram containment protocols
effects.trigger: High-level Unlock usage during major celestial/demonic clash
effects.result: Potential moment of true enforced peace on Spiritus

monster_ecology.alignment_influence: Monsters perfectly adapted to their alignment, with abilities and behaviors tied to Divine or Demonic nature
monster_ecology.sa_zone_adaptation: Monsters manifest differently based on local System Authority and current allegiance
territorial_behaviors: Celestial forces defend sanctified areas and expand divine influence
Infernal forces corrupt and consume territory, spreading chaos
The Chained navigate borders and shifting zones for survival
Major entities (Warden, Hunger, Sentinel) engage in continental-scale territorial conflict
spawning_conditions: Divine generation from concentrated prayer and holy energy
Infernal manifestation from sin, regret, and violent death
Spontaneous creation from alignment clashes and reality tears

party_size_by_rank.X_Rank: Full raid with specialized paradox preparation (20+)
party_size_by_rank.SSS_Rank: Multiple hero-level parties with alignment-balanced composition
party_size_by_rank.SS_Rank: National military force or elite hero party with strategic planning
party_size_by_rank.A_Rank: Experienced party with mixed damage types (4-6)
party_size_by_rank.C_Rank: Standard party aware of terrain effects (3-4)
party_size_by_rank.D_Rank: Small party or skilled solo with detection abilities (2-3)

alignment_preparation.divine_areas: Bring holy resistance, light-based attacks, purification items
alignment_preparation.demonic_areas: Bring curse resistance, shadow protection, corruption cleansing
alignment_preparation.shifting_areas: Bring adaptable equipment, alignment detection, quick-move capabilities

loot_tiers.epic: A to B-Rank monsters (champion-level gear and skills)
loot_tiers.rare: C to D-Rank monsters (standard combat gear)
